Summary: A hovering object w/good detail and two bright lights on the front.
divs: sighting detailsi was driving home shortly after midnight going west on harrison street. as i approached 42nd street i noticed 2 bright lights in the sky somewhat close to one another and that they were not moving as a plane normally does. as i passed 42nd street, i noticed that the object was still not moving. it was in the sky - i would say less than 500 feet above me. the wings were not like normal planes, instead they extended from the body a short distance and then they were vertical at the ends. i also noticed what i thought were small tiny greenish\blue flourescent lights that seemed to drop a small distance and then disappear. there were also lights on the bottom of the craft that were shaped like an arrow (<) that pointed towards what i assume was the front of the object. as i neared 48th street i kept turning around to view it and as i decided to get out of my car, it slowly headed east away from the direction i was in.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Bellevue
There were no other sightings in Bellevue on or around October 20th 2011
